languages.text: "Тогда этот "Немезит" начал проклинать порядки на корабле, хаять офицеров и блюстителей... А после оскорбил имя Вашей Светлости. Тут я швырнул ему в лицо перчатку и потребовал дуэли, но лишенный чести мерзавец просто выстрелил в меня. Он... смеялся надо мной. Подлая тварь". {n}Фактотум зажмуривается, не то от новой вспышки боли, не то из-за воспоминаний об унижении.{/n}

"Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тогда этот "Немезит" начал проклинать порядки на корабле, хаять офицеров и блюстителей... А после оскорбил имя Вашей Светлости. Тут я швырнул ему в лицо перчатку и потребовал дуэли, но лишенный чести мерзавец просто выстрелил в меня. Он... смеялся надо мной. Подлая тварь". {n}Фактотум зажмуривается, не то от новой вспышки боли, не то из-за воспоминаний об унижении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... And then insulted the name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... Laughed at me. The vile creature." {n}The Factotum winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of humiliation he had endured.{/n}

"Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... And then insulted the name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... Laughed at me. The vile creature." {n}The Factotum winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of humiliation he had endured.{/n}

I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}The Factotum winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

The depraved creature." {n}The Factotum winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

"Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

"Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

languages.text: "Dann zog dieser sogenannte Nemesit die Gebräuche des Schiffs in den Schmutz, beschimpfte Offiziere und Enforcer ... und beleidigte den Namen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} selbst. Ich warf ihm meinen Handschuh ins Gesicht und verlangte ein Duell, aber der ehrlose Schurke schoss einfach auf mich. Er ... lachte mich aus. Diese verkommene Kreatur." {n}Er zuckt zusammen, weil ihn entweder wieder Schmerz überkommt oder die Erinnerung an die kürzlich erfahrene Erniedrigung ihn übermannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann zog dieser sogenannte Nemesit die Gebräuche des Schiffs in den Schmutz, beschimpfte Offiziere und Enforcer ... und beleidigte den Namen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} selbst. Ich warf ihm meinen Handschuh ins Gesicht und verlangte ein Duell, aber der ehrlose Schurke schoss einfach auf mich. Er ... lachte mich aus. Diese verkommene Kreatur." {n}Er zuckt zusammen, weil ihn entweder wieder Schmerz überkommt oder die Erinnerung an die kürzlich erfahrene Erniedrigung ihn übermannt.{/n}

languages.text: «Entonces ese tal Nemesitio comenzó a despotricar de las costumbres de la nave, insultando a sus oficiales y guardias... antes de vilipendiar su mismísimo apellido, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Yo le arrojé el guante a la cara y exigí que se batiese en duelo conmigo para resarcir su honor, pero el rufián se limitó a dispararme. Se... se rió de mí. ¡Monstruo depravado!». {n}Hace una mueca que no sabrías si atribuir a una repentina punzada de dolor o al recuerdo de la humillación que ha sufrido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entonces ese tal Nemesitio comenzó a despotricar de las costumbres de la nave, insultando a sus oficiales y guardias... antes de vilipendiar su mismísimo apellido, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Yo le arrojé el guante a la cara y exigí que se batiese en duelo conmigo para resarcir su honor, pero el rufián se limitó a dispararme. Se... se rió de mí. ¡Monstruo depravado!». {n}Hace una mueca que no sabrías si atribuir a una repentina punzada de dolor o al recuerdo de la humillación que ha sufrido.{/n}

languages.text: 「そしてこのネメサイトと呼ばれる男は、この船の慣習をののしり、船の士官やエンフォーサーを非難し始めました…それから、陛下の名前そのものを侮辱し始めたのです。私は奴の顔に手袋を叩きつけて決闘を申し込見ましたが、名誉もクソもない悪党はそのまま私を撃ったのです。奴は…私を笑った。堕ちた生き物め」{n}また体が痛んだせいか、最近受けた屈辱の記憶のせいか、彼は体を縮ませた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そしてこのネメサイトと呼ばれる男は、この船の慣習をののしり、船の士官やエンフォーサーを非難し始めました…それから、陛下の名前そのものを侮辱し始めたのです。私は奴の顔に手袋を叩きつけて決闘を申し込見ましたが、名誉もクソもない悪党はそのまま私を撃ったのです。奴は…私を笑った。堕ちた生き物め」{n}また体が痛んだせいか、最近受けた屈辱の記憶のせいか、彼は体を縮ませた。{/n}

languages.text: “那个时候，那个所谓的涅墨斯特开始辱骂起了船上的制度，侮辱船上的军官和执法者……之后还侮辱了您的大名。于是我把手套扔到了他脸上，要求与他进行决斗，可那个不要脸的混蛋，居然直接朝我开枪了。他……还嘲笑我，那个卑劣的混蛋。”{n}他的脸抽搐着，可能是由于疼痛，也可能是由于刚刚屈辱的回忆。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那个时候，那个所谓的涅墨斯特开始辱骂起了船上的制度，侮辱船上的军官和执法者……之后还侮辱了您的大名。于是我把手套扔到了他脸上，要求与他进行决斗，可那个不要脸的混蛋，居然直接朝我开枪了。他……还嘲笑我，那个卑劣的混蛋。”{n}他的脸抽搐着，可能是由于疼痛，也可能是由于刚刚屈辱的回忆。{/n}

languages.text: « Et puis, ce soi-disant Némésite a commencé à vilipender les coutumes du vaisseau, à accabler d'injures ses prévôts et officiers... avant d'insulter votre auguste nom, Votre Seigneurie. Je lui ai jeté mon gant à la face et je l'ai défié en duel, mais ce gredin sans honneur s'est contenté de me tirer dessus. Il... il m'a ri au nez, le misérable. » {n}Il grimace, que ce soit sous l'effet d'un spasme de douleur ou au souvenir de l'humiliation qu'il vient d'endurer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}

Je lui ai jeté mon gant à la face et je l'ai défié en duel, mais ce gredin sans honneur s'est contenté de me tirer dessus. Il... il m'a ri au nez, le misérable. » {n}Il grimace, que ce soit sous l'effet d'un spasme de douleur ou au souvenir de l'humiliation qu'il vient d'endurer.{/n}

languages.text: "Ardından bu sözde Nemezit, geminin geleneklerine dil uzatmaya, subaylarına ve infazcılarına sözler söylemeye başladı, ardından da direkt olarak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne hakaretlerde bulundu. Eldivenimi suratına fırlatarak bir düello talep ettim ancak onursuz hain bana ateş açtı. Bana güldü. Aşağılık yaratık." {n}Yeni bir acı patlamasından veyahut da yakın zamanda maruz kaldığı aşağılanmanın anısından kaynaklı olarak titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then this so-called Nemesite started reviling the customs of the ship, berating its officers and enforcers... before insulting the very name of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} yourself. I threw my glove in his face and demanded a duel, but the honourless villain just shot me. He... laughed at me. The depraved creature." {n}He winces, either from a new burst of pain or from the memory of the humiliation he so recently endured.{/n}
